text: child day care licensing record of licenses and investigatory and monitoring visits rsa ii and iii are repealed and reenacted to read as follows information submitted in the application process shall be private confidential and not available for review however the license itself the findings of investigatory and monitoring visits and final decisions relative to licensure of the child day care agency shall be considered public information posted on the department s website and available for review by members of the public the findings of investigatory and monitoring visits and final decisions relative to licensure shall be posted on the department s website not less than business days from the date of the finding or decision and shall be available on the website for a period of years at least business days before posting the results or findings of an investigatory visit monitoring visit or a final decision relative to licensure on the department s website the department shall notify the child day care agency of its findings and the date on which the information shall be posted on the department s website the department may provide such notice by email or if the child day care agency has not provided an email address by united states mail if the child day care agency submits a response prior to the date of posting the child day care agency s response shall also be posted on the department s website
